page.title: 20Life in the Football Team
page.content: At half-past three we go down to the changing rooms.We get our kit on and we hope that we will win. We go on to the pitch and wait untill the other team comes. We all feel a bit nervous, especially when Daneswood School play us.(We lost against them twice and won once.) Our goalkeeper does not play very well. Our attack, midfield and defence are good though. Wayne is going to be our goalie next year. We give 'three cheers' to the winning side and wait for Mr.Pilmore to tell us how we did.
